definitions.title: n.gent.
definitions.body: = Cypriotes (cf. Ph. n.pr,loc. [[כת]] [[כתי]], Citium; on a connexion with Kheta, Ḫ-tā, Ḫattê, [[חִתִּי]], v. WMM:Asien u. Europa, 345;—on Citium v. Cesnola:Gyprus 46 ff);—[[אֶרֶץ כִּתִּים]] Is 23:1, [[כִּתִּיי֠ם]] v:Is 23:12; [[כִּתִּים]] (as son of Yawan) Ge 10:4 = 1Ch 1:7; [[וְחִים]] ´[[מִיַּד כ]] Nu 24:24 ships from the side (direction) of Kittim; more generally, of coast-lands of Mediterranean , [[אִיֵּי כִּתִּיִּים]] Je 2:10, [[אִיֵּי כִּתִּיִּם]] Ez Eze 27:6; even of Macedonian Greece, [[חִיִּים כִּתִּים]] Da 11:30 (only here as adj., cf. Bev) i.e. Grecian ships.
